!Emperor Shunaiman: Don't worry about me! I am built of simple flesh and bone, but the Empire... it houses the dreams of so, so many people. Now, listen. The final room contains four sealing devices, each of which need to be activated. You will then need to gather the four Binding Seals... and bring them back to me. Do not lose the sword, and do not discard the holy water--they are absolutely vital to our survival!
